ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Tranix Crown Disappointment.....
ygData.msgSnippet: Loaded question;-) But the point is moot since the decision was made and the item given. ...would it be possible to get a few buds together to do this again?
ygData.messageBody:
Loaded question;-)

But the point is moot since the decision was made and
the item given.

...would it be possible to get a few buds together to
do this again? Then you'd get the crown....


--- John_Senior@... wrote:
> Last night on Veeshan a few members from 3-4 guilds
> participated in a Fire
> Giant run, there were about 7 from our guild and 18
> people in total so we
> had more than enough, things went well and the first
> giants were killed
> easily, our monk puller was doing an excellent job
> and managed to pull
> Tranix solo, the crown was dropped and I asked to be
> in the roll for it,
> there was only myself and an enchanter there that
> would use it to it's full
> potential. But instead it was decided that the
> enchanter should get to keep
> the item and that I shouldn't get to roll for it.
>
> I was really angry to be treated like this
> especially as we have just got a
> new charm song, the tranix crown would of been
> great.
>
> I just thought I would post this here and see
> whether you guys and girls
> think I should of got to roll for this item?
>
> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 44.8 Songs <Guardians of
> Light>
> Veeshan Server
>
>
>
>
